name: thedailybeast
text: Becki Falwell had a sexual encounter with one of her son’s 22-year-old Liberty University classmates in 2008 and pursued him for months after, Politico reports https://t.co/v8Jka7AqWc

name: thedailybeast
text: Simply programming your convention to other topics doesn’t make the surrounding reality no longer exist. A pandemic ravaging the country is still a pandemic, after all, even if it goes unmentioned in primetime. https://t.co/WplWQEBWGQ

name: thedailybeast
text:
President Trump will officially accept the Republican nomination at the White House in the final night of the #RNC2020. Stay tuned for our coverage starting at 8:30 p.m. ET.

Read how the GOP is tuning out the chaos surrounding it in last night's recap: https://t.co/8Gfu1DwGYU
